Hypertension is characterized by systemic high blood pressure and is the most common and important risk factor for the development of cardiovascular diseases.

They find hypertensive individuals to have a higher expression of the heat shock protein 70 gene. But they admit to being perplexed about whether the gene’s turning on helps cause hypertension, or hypertension causes the gene’s being turned on.
